alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 3:12AM EST until February 08 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and sleet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for a storm total of 3 to 8 inches and sleet accumulations of between 1/10 and 2/10 of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern New Hampshire and south central, west central and western Maine. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy wet snow in some spots this morning may cause isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
